rules.title: Régle - R.01
rules.text: Be respectful to everyone. No harassment, hate speech, racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, or any other form of discrimination will be tolerated.

rules.title: rule 2
rules.text: No NSFW content. This includes, but is not limited to, nudity, gore, and sexual content.
